alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fremont County through 445 PM MDT... At 415 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Florence, or 15 miles northwest of Junkins Burn Scar. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft
